name: blue-flare
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to burn the target.
short_effect: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave the target with a burn.
